about_the_game:
Ten years ago, the world almost ended. Locked away in your bunker, you were safe. The rest of the world wasn't so lucky. In a single night, monsters appeared from nowhere and ravaged the world, leaving on destruction and scattered groups of humans clinging to survival.



Now it's time to leave your bunker and start to rebuild. First you'll need to establish a safe space where people can be protected from the monsters that still roam the surface. That'll require resources and of course, people. The world is very different from the one you knew when you entered the bunker. People are scarce and many are prone to violence. Others just want to survive and are very appreciative of anyone that can help them do that.



In a world where there aren't many good people left, it turns out being one of those good ones is extremely rewarding. Build up trust and relationships with people both inside and outside of your settlement.





Visit multiple unique locations and scavenge resources while navigating the random events. Gather enough to build up your base and claw back some of the creature comforts you once knew.





Be careful where you go, monsters still roam the Earth. Moving in the daytime is your best bet as the monsters enjoy the darkness.



Specifically designed for one handed play, this is a point and click style interactive visual novel.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains nudity, sex, fetish content such as transformation, latex, pegging and optional futanari content. Some scenes deal with death and murder as well as references to alcohol.

detailed_description:
Ten years ago, the world almost ended. Locked away in your bunker, you were safe. The rest of the world wasn't so lucky. In a single night, monsters appeared from nowhere and ravaged the world, leaving on destruction and scattered groups of humans clinging to survival.



Now it's time to leave your bunker and start to rebuild. First you'll need to establish a safe space where people can be protected from the monsters that still roam the surface. That'll require resources and of course, people. The world is very different from the one you knew when you entered the bunker. People are scarce and many are prone to violence. Others just want to survive and are very appreciative of anyone that can help them do that.



In a world where there aren't many good people left, it turns out being one of those good ones is extremely rewarding. Build up trust and relationships with people both inside and outside of your settlement.





Visit multiple unique locations and scavenge resources while navigating the random events. Gather enough to build up your base and claw back some of the creature comforts you once knew.





Be careful where you go, monsters still roam the Earth. Moving in the daytime is your best bet as the monsters enjoy the darkness.



Specifically designed for one handed play, this is a point and click style interactive visual novel.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+
  • Processor: One made in the last 10 years.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Same as the windows requirements, if you can read this, you're probably fine
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

name: Saviour of the Wasteland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything newer than Vista.
  • Processor: One made in the last 10 years.
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Pretty much anything, if your monitors work, you're probably good.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexuelle Inhalte
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: Saviour of the Wasteland is a very NSFW adult, interactive visual novel. Scavenge resources, build your settlement, meet lots of new people, discover secrets and have lots of sex while navigating the challenges of the wasteland.
